statement.name: UPDATE_SMASDE
statement.desc: Actualizar registro de la tabla Edificios
statement.sql: UPDATE SMAEDF SET BLKEDF=?,CSTEDF=?,DIREDF=?,EXTEDF=?,LFTOBJ=?,NOMEDF=?,PHTOBJ=?,PSOEDF=?,SQLBKR=?, TELEDF=?,TOPOBJ=?,VLREDF=? WHERE CODCIA=? AND CODEDF=?

statement.name: DELETE_SMAEDF
statement.desc: Eliminar registro de la tabla facultades
statement.sql: DELETE FROM SMAEDF WHERE CODCIA= ? and CODEDF=? and NROSDE=?
